metadata.name: Bitcoin mining notes on napkin
metadata.description:
This is a drawing of key information from Episode #20 of 'Closing The Loop' podcast with John Vallis during his interview with Bob Burnett. [Note: the two triangles are summative of what is necessary in order to create a bitcoin mining operation].

Specific information included on napkin:  
- Eh/s as of 2/4/2023  
- # of bitcoins per block  
- # of blocks per day  
- $ price of bitcoin  
- Known and unknown elements in any bitcoin mining operation  
- 3 necessary components to any bitcoin mining operation: Equipment, Energy & Capital
